The Bookmarks Menu

(keyboard shortcut: Alt-B)




Menu option

Allows you to

Manage Bookmarks ...
(keyboard shortcut:
Alt-A-O)

launch the Bookmarks dialog which allows you to delete bookmarks from this menu.

N.B. Bookmarks are added using The Node Right-Click Menu 'Bookmark Node' option.

Bookmarrks List

Below 'ManageBookmarks' there will be a list of any bookmarks you have added. Clicking on a bookmark menu item will open the associaed view and highlight the associated node.

For backward compatibility, if you have any Favorite nodes added using the previous Favorites system, these will appear on the bottom on the Bookmarks list, for example, 'Tasks' , in the above figure. They willl be distinguished by having standard node icons rather than the internal reference icon. You will still be able to use these as before (for transcluding the associated node into the current view), but you will no longer be able to create new ones.
